name: Kung Pao Chicken
description: A spicy stir-fry dish made with diced chicken, peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers.
ingredients: Chicken breast, Peanuts, Dried chili peppers, Soy sauce, Sugar, Cornstarch, Garlic, Ginger, Scallions

name: Dumplings
description: Steamed or fried pockets of dough filled with meat, vegetables, or seafood.
ingredients: Ground pork, Cabbage, Soy sauce, Ginger, Garlic, Sesame oil, Dumpling wrappers

name: Beef Chow Mein
description: A stir-fried noodle dish with beef, vegetables, and Chinese egg noodles.
ingredients: Beef sirloin, Chinese egg noodles, Bean sprouts, Carrots, Celery, Scallions, Soy sauce, Oyster sauce, Cornstarch, Garlic, Ginger

name: Hot and Sour Soup
description: A spicy and tangy soup made with mushrooms, bamboo shoots, tofu, and eggs.
ingredients: Chicken broth, Shiitake mushrooms, Bamboo shoots, Tofu, Eggs, Vinegar, Soy Sauce, Chili oil, Cornstarch, Garlic, Ginger, Green onions

name: General Tso's Chicken
description: A sweet and spicy fried chicken dish coated in a thick sauce made with soy sauce, sugar, and vinegar.
ingredients: Chicken breast, Egg, Cornstarch, Soy sauce, Sugar, Rice vinegar, Garlic, Ginger, Dried chili peppers, Scallions, Vegetable oil

name: Egg Fried Rice
description: A simple but delicious dish made by stir-frying cooked rice with eggs and vegetables.
ingredients: Cooked rice, Eggs, Peas, Carrots, Green onions, Soy sauce, Vegetable oil

name: Ma Po Tofu
description: A spicy and savory dish made with soft tofu, ground pork, and Sichuan peppercorns.
ingredients: Soft tofu, Ground pork, Sichuan peppercorns, Chili bean paste, Garlic, Ginger, Scallions, Soy sauce, Sugar, Cornstarch, Vegetable oil

name: Wonton Soup
description: A light soup made with wontons filled with ground pork and shrimp, served with vegetables and noodles.
ingredients: Ground pork, Shrimp, Wonton wrappers, Chicken broth, Bok choy, Carrots, Green onions, Soy sauce, Rice vinegar, Ginger, Sesame oil, Egg noodles

name: Mongolian Beef
description: A sweet and savory stir-fry dish made with thinly sliced beef, green onions, and a sauce made with soy sauce, brown sugar, and garlic.
ingredients: Flank steak, Cornstarch, Vegetable oil, Garlic, Ginger, Green onions, Soy sauce, Brown sugar, Water, Corn syrup, Red pepper flakes

name: Mapo Eggplant
description: A Sichuan-style dish made with eggplant, ground pork, doubanjiang (spicy bean paste), and Sichuan peppercorns.
ingredients: Eggplant, Ground pork, Doubanjiang (spicy bean paste), Sichuan peppercorns, Garlic, Ginger, Green onions, Soy sauce, Cornstarch, Vegetable oil

name: Chinese Hot and Sour Soup
description: A popular soup with a combination of spicy and sour flavors made with tofu, shiitake mushrooms, and wood ear mushrooms.
ingredients: Tofu, Shiitake mushrooms, Wood ear mushrooms, Bamboo shoots, Eggs, Cornstarch, Soy sauce, Rice vinegar, Sesame oil, Chili oil, White pepper, Green onions

name: Chinese Steamed Fish
description: A simple and healthy Chinese dish made with a whole fish steamed with ginger, scallions, and soy sauce.
ingredients: Whole fish (such as sea bass or tilapia), Ginger, Scallions, Soy sauce, Shaoxing wine, Sesame oil, Cornstarch, Water

name: Dan Dan Noodles
description: A spicy and savory Sichuan-style noodle dish made with ground pork, sesame paste, and Sichuan peppercorns.
ingredients: Noodles, Ground pork, Soy sauce, Sesame oil, Sugar, Chili oil, Sichuan peppercorns, Garlic, Ginger, Green onions, Sesame paste, Vegetable oil

name: Peking Duck
description: A classic Beijing dish made with crispy roasted duck served with thin pancakes, scallions, and hoisin sauce.
ingredients: Whole duck, Hoisin sauce, Scallions, Thin pancakes, Honey, Rice vinegar, Ginger, Star anise, Cinnamon, Sichuan peppercorns

name: Ma Po Tofu
description: A spicy and flavorful Sichuan-style dish made with tofu, ground pork, and doubanjiang (spicy bean paste).
ingredients: Tofu, Ground pork, Doubanjiang (spicy bean paste), Soy sauce, Sichuan peppercorns, Garlic, Ginger, Green onions, Cornstarch, Vegetable oil
